content.Description: The name of the table to write to.

The engine type to use for the table. This must be one of the following engine types: MergeTree, ReplacingMergeTree, SummingMergeTree, AggregatingMergeTree, ReplicatedMergeTree, ReplicatedReplacingMergeTree, ReplicatedSummingMergeTree, ReplicatedAggregatingMergeTree.
The table path for replicated tables. This is required when using any of the replication engines. Check out the documentation for more information
The replica_name for replicated tables. This is required when using any of the replication engines.
The cluster to create tables in. This is passed as the clickhouse_cluster argument when creating a table. Documentation can be found here.
The default target database schema name to use for all streams.
Config object for stream maps capability. For more information check out Stream Maps.
User-defined config values to be used within map expressions.
'True' to enable schema flattening and automatically expand nested properties.
The max depth to flatten schemas.
